data.name: KeepUp Pirates - RPG
data.detailed_description:
Witte´s Studio - Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1524630/KeepUp_Survival/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1843710/KeepUp_Hunter/


About the Game

KeepUp Pirates - RPG

is a free, simple role-playing game.


You are a pirate on an island, survive alone or with other players and fight against enemy skeletons. Build a shelter and gather resources to ensure your survival. A building, crafting, farming and cooking system will allow you to create something great.

Your survival skills are in demand!

Special features: Qeust and skill system and much more.

Creative Mode


The game offers them a free mode, also known as creative mode. Here they are not limited and can realize their dreams while building.

Information:


- Building System
- Crafting System
- Inventory System
- Farming System
- Combat System
- Skill Tree System
- Character system

data.short_description: You are a pirate on an island, survive alone or with other players and fight against enemy skeletons. Build a shelter and go collect resources to ensure your survival.
data.reviews:
“Great game. with bugs but what game is without bugs? xd”
24.8 Std – @R41N3

“This game is incredible. More fun than I've had on many other paid for games like this.”
11.7 Std. – @w0lf_gang_

“whoever made the crafting HUD should be incarcerated”
17.5 Std – @maci

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 2GB or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB / NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: KeepUp Pirates - RPG is not a complete in-house development of Witte's Studio. If you have any legal questions, please use the contact options. Any changes or additions to KeepUp Pirates - RPG will be made by Witte's Studio.
